tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_location_archives (
    player_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE player_statistics (
    player_id UUID,
    games_played INT,
    total_score INT,
    level INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_locations (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_x FLOAT,
    location_y FLOAT,
    location_z FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE player_activities (
    activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT REFERENCES player_locations(player_id),
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_description TEXT,
    activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE player_statistics (
    player_id INT REFERENCES player_locations(player_id),
    games_played INT,
    score INT,
    level INT,
    statistics_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
